snippet: The average of 4.2 million total viewers on Sunday for the British period drama is double the average prime-time audience on PBS.
abstract: The average of 4.2 million total viewers on Sunday for the British period drama is double the average prime-time audience on PBS.
lead_paragraph: The Season 2 premiere of the British period drama "Downton Abbey" drew an average of 4.2 million total viewers on Sunday, doubling the average prime-time rating on PBS, the ArtsBeat blog reported. The drama, which stars Maggie Smith (left) as the Dowager Countess, experienced an 18 percent jump in the 18-to-49-year-old demographic when compared with the typical rating from the first season, according to Nielsen data.

headline.main: Big Ratings for 'Downton Abbey' on PBS
